description: Table showing first formal quarterly figures on the use of Taser; a) all uses of Taser in the UK since introduction in April 2004 up to 30 November 2007; b) Taser use by authorised firearms officers outside of a firearms authority from 20 July 2007 to 30 November 2007; and c) Taser use by specially trained units in the first three months in the 10 trial forces areas from 1 September 2007 to 30 November 2007. 5 p.
